text:
XML document validation by XML schema is not performed by xerces1.4.4. 
It always gives the error from ErrorHandler: 
"Element type must be declared". 
I have tested it, if my code could find the file. It could the validation by 
DTD but not with XML schema. 

Thank you,
Paul
creator: ppal@olf.com
lm@mendelson.de
text:
Also the validation for xerces_2_0_1 doesn't work. :(
The xerces_1_4_2 had no problems with 
this.

Leo

It would really help if you post the test case and sample code.
XML Schema validation does work in Xerces, so you are probably doing something 
wrong in your code.
creator: elena@apache.org
